Text: New TW POI contact personsI will be leaving the company next Friday March Dennis Lee will be the new contact person for all new POI setups and questions related to Transwestern POIs Elizabeth Brown will be his backup Please direct all future communications regarding TW POIs to Dennis and Elizabeth Thanks Karen Brostad

Re ElPasoTW Eddy POI DRNDRN number assigned is Sorry I left that off the first notice kb Karen Brostad AM To Linda TrevinoET NRON Perry FrazierET NRON James MooreET NRON John BuchananET NRON Dennis LeeET NRON Darrell SchoolcraftET NRON Gary SpragginsET NRON Linda WardET NRON Beverly MillerET NRON Cynthia RiversET NRON Sigrid NRON Terry KowalkeET NRON Albert HernandezET NRON Dale EldridgeET NRON Amy MulliganET NRON Vernon MercaldoET NRON Donald VignaroliET NRON Bret FritchET NRON Gale RamsaranET NRON Michelle LokayET nron Tammy JaquetET NRON Mary DraemerET NRON James NRON Lorraine LindbergET NRON Jeffery FawcettET NRON Martha CormierET NRON cc Subject ElPasoTW Eddy POI Please be advised the following point has been set up on Transwestern Pipeline Name El PasoTW Eddy Rec Type PDC Direction Receipt to TW Location Sec TS RE Eddy Co NM Added to templates All Reciepts Firm Alt Receipts East of Thoreau Receipts Effective date Michele Cormier please add to OBA for El Paso Field Services Thanks Karen Brostad

Reconnect of TW POI Cc is being connected to EOG effective this week and flow is expected by Friday The POI was existing under Highlands Pronghorn and has never flowed The existing POI will be used but has been changed as follows POI Number New POI Name EOG Pronghorn Location Sec TE RE Leo CoNew Mexico DRN New POI Operator EOG Resources Station Dale Please add this POI to the OBA for EOG Resources CR effective immediately Remove from OBA for Duke DR Thanks Karen Brostad

New POI on TW Calpine Cc POI was established on Transwestern effective Name Calpine So Point Power Del POI POI Type CIC CommercialIndustrial Connect DRN Operator Calpine Energy Services LP This point has been added to the West of Thoreau Deliveries and Interruptible Deliveries templates If anyone has questions please advise Karen Brostad

RE Displacement points Cc Points have been added to the All Receipt Template effective They have been identified in PLE as displacement points There are no changes required related to measurement Should anyone need something further please advise Karen Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Monday July PM To Brostad Karen Cc Lokay Michelle Lohman TK Giambrone Laura Hernandez Bert McEvoy Christine Miller Beverly Minter Tracy Mulligan Amy Ward Linda Subject Displacement points Please set up the following deliverys as a receipt displacement poi Calpine power plant Griffith Citizens Flagstaff Citizens Kingman Citizens FN If you have any questions please call DS

TWDuke Energy Wt RecThe following new point has been added to Transwestern POI system effective POI Name TWDuke Energy WT Rec POI TYpe PDC DRN Station Location Sec TS RE Lea County NM The transport contract that will use this point initially is CR

New PNR points on TranswesternPer request from Marketing I have established the following new Park and Ride points for Transwestern Pipeline These points have been added to the PNR template in CBS and therefore will be available with all other Park and Ride points on PNR contracts POI Name PNR SWGas Mohave POI DRN Station na Location SEC TN RW Mohave AZ Effective Related to physical POI TWSGTC Mohave Delivery POI Name PNR Citizens Griffith POI DRN Station na Location SEC TN RW Mohave AZ Effective Related to physical POI Citizens Griffith Energy Delivery POI Name PNR Calpine Southpoint POI DRN Station na Location SEC TN RW Mohave AZ Effective Related to physical POI Calpine So Point Power Delivery

New Transwestern POIsPlease be advised the following new points have been established for Transwestern POI Name Agave LocoEddy County in Loop POI Number Meter DRN Location Sec TS RE Eddy County NM Type PDC Operator Transwestern Pipeline POI Name Agave Dodd POI Number Meter DRN Location Sec TS RE Type PDC Operator Transwestern Pipeline Elizabeth please look over the lateral ID marketing lateral ID the supply basin etc and GRI flag and let me know if any changes need to be made Thanks Karen

FW Sid Richardson Blk FuelI have set up POI for this fuel delivery I need someone to provide the following information in order to complete setup of the POI Is the West Texas Supply basin correct Is the East of Thoreau Area correct Should the point have GRI yes or no What is the Lateral ID to be used What is the Marketing Lateral ID to be used Thanks Karen Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Monday September PM To Brostad Karen Subject Sid Richardson Blk Fuel Attached is a GSCR
GRI flag fixed on POIs Cc Per your phone message the GRI flag has been changed to yes on POI Calpineand Griffith effective Karen

RE FNG Bartow Delivery Cc POI Name FNG Bartow Delivery POI DRN Station dont have yet Location Sec TS RE Polk Co FL Milepost This station is set up in PLE I do not have a meter number and I will need it set up and downloaded into PLE Phyllis please let me know if you need something further from me Karen Brostad Original Message From Fuller Phyllis Sent Wednesday January PM To Brostad Karen Howard Jack Lokey Teb Laferla Lynda Wagoner Michael Farrell Sharon Alters Dennis Dietz Rick Nacey Sheila Cc Irchirl Kimberly Subject Please inform if you have any paperwork that references FLORIDA NATURAL GROWERS BARTOW According to the field tech on the th of December this station began to flow Thanks Phyllis Fuller

RE FNG Bartow Delivery Cc Phyllis Did this station get set up yesterday It did not come across in PLE yet I guess it should have a start date of since that is when it started to flow Would you please work with Jeff to get this set up Karen Original Message From Fuller Phyllis Sent Wednesday January PM To Brostad Karen Howard Jack Lokey Teb Laferla Lynda Wagoner Michael Farrell Sharon Alters Dennis Dietz Rick Nacey Sheila Cc Irchirl Kimberly Floyd Jodie Subject RE FNG Bartow Delivery Station number Original Message From Brostad Karen Sent Wednesday January PM To Fuller Phyllis Howard Jack Lokey Teb Laferla Lynda Wagoner Michael Farrell Sharon Alters Dennis Dietz Rick Nacey Sheila Cc Irchirl Kimberly Floyd Jodie Subject RE FNG Bartow Delivery POI Name FNG Bartow Delivery POI DRN Station dont have yet Location Sec TS RE Polk Co FL Milepost This station is set up in PLE I do not have a meter number and I will need it set up and downloaded into PLE Phyllis please let me know if you need something further from me Karen Brostad Original Message From Fuller Phyllis Sent Wednesday January PM To Brostad Karen Howard Jack Lokey Teb Laferla Lynda Wagoner Michael Farrell Sharon Alters Dennis Dietz Rick Nacey Sheila Cc Irchirl Kimberly Subject Please inform if you have any paperwork that references FLORIDA NATURAL GROWERS BARTOW According to the field tech on the th of December this station began to flow Thanks Phyllis Fuller

FW Duplicate numbers updateTo anyone who is interested the following meter numbers have been changed due to duplication of meter numbers Please make note in your records Thanks Karen Brostad Original Message From Fuller Phyllis Sent Tuesday January PM To Brostad Karen Irchirl Kimberly Sims Peggy Subject RE Duplicate numbers update Mobile Bay to GS NEW NUMBER Brostad Karen POI DRN Exxon Mobile Bay to GS NEW NUMBER Brostad Karen POI DRN Calpine Washing Parish Power NEW NUMBER Brostad Karen POI DRN Original Message Phyllis Fuller From Brostad Karen Sent Monday January AM To Fuller Phyllis Irchirl Kimberly Subject Duplicate numbers update Okay ladies thanks for your phone messages Here is where we are with duplicate meter numbers The issue does not appear to be a problem for you There is a meter number that exists in PLE but the company identifier is Transwestern so that should be okay the meter numbers that have been used already for Florida are as follows Assigned to Aux Perry in Current status is Removed but I cannot delete it from the history in PLE POI Mobile Bay to GS will need another meter number assigned to it Assigned to Cottage Perry Current status is Removed same issue as above cannot delete History so POI Exxon Mobile Bay to GS point needs a new meter number assigned Assigned to Misc CS Current status is removed same issue as above cannot delete History so POI Calpine Washing Parish Power plant needs a new meter number assigned Thanks for your help Call me if you have questions Karen

New Transwestern POIsPlease be advised the following new points have been established for Transwestern POI Name Agave LocoEddy County in Loop POI Number Meter DRN Location Sec TS RE Eddy County NM Type PDC Operator Transwestern Pipeline POI Name Agave Dodd POI Number Meter DRN Location Sec TS RE Type PDC Operator Transwestern Pipeline Elizabeth please look over the lateral ID marketing lateral ID the supply basin etc and GRI flag and let me know if any changes need to be made Thanks Karen

FW Sid Richardson Blk FuelWould someone provide me the following information on the Sid Richardson point that was set up in September Thanks Karen Original Message From Brostad Karen Sent Tuesday September AM To Schoolcraft Darrell Lindberg Lorraine Lokay Michelle Hyatt Kevin Subject FW Sid Richardson Blk Fuel I have set up POI for this fuel delivery I need someone to provide the following information in order to complete setup of the POI Is the West Texas Supply basin correct Is the East of Thoreau Area correct Should the point have GRI yes or no What is the Lateral ID to be used What is the Marketing Lateral ID to be used Thanks Karen Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Monday September PM To Brostad Karen Subject Sid Richardson Blk Fuel Attached is a GSCR
